com.absio.database.table

Class Accesses

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.database.table.AbstractTable
      • com.absio.database.table.Accesses

  • public class Accesses
extends AbstractTable
    The represents a table for storing Access that are a part of Metadata which is stored in Containers.

    • Method Detail

      • getCountSql

        public ParameterizedSql getCountSql(UUID userId,
                                    UUID containerId)
        Get the count SQL for the given userId and containerId. If both are null the count SQL for the table is returned.
        Parameters:
        userId - the userID to count or null to count all records
        containerId - the containerId to count or null to count all records
        Returns:
        the count SQL

      • getCreateSql

        public String getCreateSql()
        Get the create SQL for the table.
        Specified by:
        getCreateSql in class AbstractTable
        Returns:
        the create SQL for the table

      • getDeleteSql

        public ParameterizedSql getDeleteSql(UUID userId,
                                     UUID containerId)
        Get the delete SQL for the table with the give container id. If the container id is null, the delete sql to remove all rows is returned.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's access to delete
        containerId - the container's access to delete
        Returns:
        the delete SQL for the table

      • getInsertSql

        public ParameterizedSql getInsertSql(Access access)
        Get the insert SQL for the table using the given Access.

        NOTE: the access, access container id and access user id must all be defined

        Parameters:
        access - the access to insert
        Returns:
        the insert SQL for the table
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the required values are null

      • getQuerySql

        public ParameterizedSql getQuerySql(UUID userId,
                                    UUID containerId)
        Get the query SQL for the user id and container id. If the user id and container id are null the SQL will return all rows from the table.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id to query
        containerId - the container id to query
        Returns:
        the query SQL

      • getUpdateSql

        public ParameterizedSql getUpdateSql(Access access)
        Get the update SQL for the table using the given Access.

        NOTE: the access, access container id and access user id must all be defined

        Parameters:
        access - the access to update
        Returns:
        the update SQL for the table
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the required values are null
